api_list.name: Calling by Country Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rest-country.p.rapidapi.com/country/name/india"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rest-country.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rest-country.p.rapidapi.com/country/name/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rest-country.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://rest-country.p.rapidapi.com/country/{aphacode}"
